name: Jumble Jam
description:
Create wacky ideas from consisting ideas!

Try to create ideas that cohere with the prompt. Or don't. It's honestly pretty tough. Just try to have a funny idea that scores votes.

Created to reduce game designers' fear of failure by disconnecting a designer from their ideas.
developers: -【 ʎ ɟ ɟ n ʍ ~ o ɔ ᴉ u 】-
